alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Hubbard; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:56AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Hubbard, Wadena and eastern Otter Tail Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 455 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Garfield to near Rose City to near Long Prairie. Movement was north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Parkers Prairie and Wrightstown around 510 AM CDT. Almora around 515 AM CDT. Verndale, Aldrich and Staples Airport around 520 AM CDT. Deer Creek around 525 AM CDT. Bluffton, Blue Grass and Wadena around 530 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for central, north central, northwestern and west central Minnesota.
